name: Star Kids
description:
Star Kids is inspired by 8-bit games for the Nintendo Entertaiment System console, as well as subordinated graphically, musically under this system and Klonoa inspirated game, play the title Star Kids, Pami, a blue-loving and energetic bunny, and Lumi, a girly girl cat who likes the color pink. Travel through 8 different worlds and stop Lord Hades from taking over the world. The game is designed for both single and two players simultaneously in co-op mode.

Controls

Arrows - Move

Shift - Jump

Ctrl -  Using Wand

controls can be changed in options menu.
